description:
Title: Collection of the latest games Alawar - July 2014
Edition type: Piratka
Genre: business, quest items, quest, puzzle, child, balls, shooting games, three in a row
Developer: Youda Games, Playcamedy, Itera Laboratories & Game House, Big Fish Games & Elephant Games/Alawar Entertainment
Year: 2014
Platform: PC

Interface language: Russian
Tablet: complete

System requirements: 
Operating system: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8
Processor: 1Ghz
Memory: 512 Mb RAM,
Video card: 64 Mb VRAM,
Additional software: DirectX 9.0

Installation instructions:
1. To install favourite games corresponding .exe files
2. Run installed game via the desktop shortcut. 
3. After expiration of the trial period, the executable AlawarCrack.exe . In the opened window, click PATCH/PATCH and specify the path to the executable file (.exe) games and click on the Open button. Specify the file to run the game (without .wrp in the title)
3. Under the activator window appears that tells us about the success of the operation. Click on the notice "OK", and on the activator OUTPUT.
4. Start the game with a shortcut on the desktop. Enjoy the game!

P.S. In the menu of the Activator is video tutorial


Description: a Complete collection of Alawar games for July 2014
Alawar Entertainment is a company specializing in the development and distribution of computer games for the mass audience of users on personal computers, mobile platforms, game consoles and other platforms.

Earlier the company Alawar Entertainment has specialized in the publisher of casual games, and now the company has focused on the development and publishing of free-to-play-games. During the work of the company was published in more than 300's own brands.

The Treasures Of Montezuma. 4 in 1
